pattern.name: Postpone Into Green Phase
pattern.problem: It is a general aim is to enable users to use energy in a way that conserves resources. However, the application used does not know how the energy it consumes has been generated (e.g. regenerative or not). (See [1].)
pattern.solution: Offer the software application the possibility to carry of not urgently needed operations when green electricity is available. (E.g., postpone computationally intensive computations, where possible.) For this purpose, a component must be provided which provides information about the way in which the currently available energy has been generated.

literature.bibliomixed: Geiger et al. (2020): Ressourceneffiziente Programmierung. Berlin: Bitkom, S. 9.
